input_args.text: 'Butler Shaffer https://www.lewrockwell.com/lrc-blog/re-jury-nullification-2/ \nChris: It is telling not only that this academician has tenure, but that he has tenure at a STATE university. Do you think he might be concerned that this jury’s decision might reflect a growing disrespect for the arbitrary arrogance of state power; a weakening that might endanger his continued employment? 12:20  '
